data.eml:eml: Micromoina arboricola n. gen., n. spec. (Crustacea: Cladocera), a new moinid living in a forest tree-hole in Minas Gerais, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dumont, Henri J., Rietzler, Arnola C., Kalapothakis, Evanguedes (2013): Micromoina arboricola n. gen., n. spec. (Crustacea: Cladocera), a new moinid living in a forest tree-hole in Minas Gerais, Brazil. Zootaxa 3652 (5): 533-546, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3652.5.3
